roleset.name: calculate, reckon, think

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: She turns on her computer to check out the closing share prices for the Taiwan Stock Exchange and the opening figures for the US exchanges , and then makes a quick calculation in her head of her total wealth .

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Their calculation of its value, $2.5 million, was disputed.

roleset.note: Based on verb entry calculate.01; no corresponding VN entry.
